sense.gloss: to cut, to cut through, to perform (surgery)
to sever (connections, ties)
to turn off (e.g. the light)
to terminate (e.g. a conversation), to hang up (the phone), to disconnect
to punch (a ticket), to tear off (a stub)
to open (something sealed)
to start
to set (a limit), to do (something) in less or within a certain time, to issue (cheques, vouchers, etc.)
to reduce, to decrease, to discount
to shake off (water, etc.), to let drip-dry, to let drain
to cross, to traverse
to criticize sharply
to act decisively, to do (something noticeable), to go first, to make (certain facial expressions, in kabuki)
to turn (vehicle, steering wheel, etc.)
to curl (a ball), to bend, to cut
to shuffle (cards)
to discard a tile
to dismiss, to sack, to let go, to expulse, to excommunicate
to dig (a groove), to cut (a stencil, on a mimeograph)
to trump
to cut (the connection between two groups)
to start a fire (with wood-wood friction or by striking a metal against stone)
to draw (a shape) in the air (with a sword, etc.)
to do completely

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓が↑援助↑↓えんじょ↓の↑手↑↓て↓をさしのべるのを↑拒絶↑↓きょぜつ↓したら、あなたはどうして↑資金繰↑↓しきんぐ↓りの↑危機↑↓きき↓を↑乗↑↓の↓り|↑切↑↓き↓る|のか。
sdata.e: How do you expect to weather the financial storm when the bank refuses to extend a helping hand?

sdata.j: ↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑勢力↑↓せいりょく↓に↑加担↑↓かたん↓するスパイ↑活動↑↓かつどう↓にたずさわるならば、あなたは↑祖国↑↓そこく↓を↑裏|切↑↓うらぎ↓る|ことになる。
sdata.e: If you engage in espionage for a foreign power, you are selling your country down the river.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓は↑身↑↓み↓を|↑切↑↓き↓る|ような↑寒↑↓さむ↓さだった。
↑科学↑↓かがく↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には↑百↑↓ひゃく↓↑年↑↓ねん↓↑以内↑↓いない↓に↑世界↑↓せかい↓の↑石油↑↓せきゆ↓↑資源↑↓しげん↓を↑使↑↓つか↓い|↑切↑↓き↓る|だろうと↑予言↑↓よげん↓する↑者↑↓もの↓もいる。
sdata.e: Some scientists predict that the world oil reserves will be used up within a century.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑出↑↓で↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓にはガスのスイッチを|↑切↑↓き↓る|のを↑忘↑↓わす↓れないでください。
sdata.e: Don't forget to turn off the gas before you leave the house.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かこれを|↑切↑↓き↓る|ものを↑貸↑↓か↓してください。
sdata.e: Lend me something with which to cut this.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かこのひもを|↑切↑↓き↓る|ものを↑貸↑↓か↓して↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Lend me something with which to cut the string.

sdata.j: ロープを|↑切↑↓き↓る|ナイフがほしい。
sdata.e: I want a knife with which to cut the rope.

sdata.j: ようやくスーザンは↑母親↑↓ははおや↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑切↑↓き↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げ、↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑書↑↓か↓くと↑約束↑↓やくそく↓し、↑電話↑↓でんわ↓を|↑切↑↓き↓る|。
sdata.e: Finally, Susan cuts her mother short, promises to write, and hangs up.

sdata.j: ↑道路↑↓どうろ↓を↑横|切↑↓よこぎ↓る|ときには↑必↑↓かなら↓ず↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓に↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑確認↑↓かくにん↓しなさい。
sdata.e: Never go across the street without looking for cars first.
